title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Reverse Side", ca. 1985
medium: Black and gold marking pens, turquoise crayon (?) on white tracing paper
description: Three panel screen on wheels in form of three buildings.  Central skyscraper in black with with red stepped superstructure with two antenae. Two indentical structures on either side consisting of black lower portion with blue scalloped outer edge.  Upper portion is light gray with black dots and green fan-shaped motif on top with clock-like markings; a single gold ball is on outer top edge of each buidling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Reverse Side", ca. 1985.
ca. 1985. Black and gold marking pens, turquoise crayon (?) on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-103.
